SMSTPDUContainer::SMSTPDUContainer (  uint8 *  pPayload,
size_t  nPayloadSize = 0,
const char *  sRxPhone = "",
const char *  sServiceCenter = ""
)  [inline]
 

Creates a new SMSTPDU from data.

Pointer to the data. Length of the data. Null-terminated string with phonenumber. Optional service center address.

Definition at line 141 of file SMSTPDU.h.

const char* SMSTPDUContainer::getPhoneNumber (   )  const [inline]
 

Get the phonenumber of the message.

Returns:
Pointer to the telephone number of the message. Sender when receiving and recipient when sending. N.B. Just a pointer into the object. If you want to use it after the object is destroyed you must copy it.

Definition at line 122 of file SMSTPDU.h.

const char* SMSTPDUContainer::getServiceCenterNumber (   )  const [inline]
 

Get the phonenumber of the service center.

Returns:
The telephone number of the service center. N.B. Just a pointer into the object. If you want to use it after the object is destroyed you must copy it.
